T02D3420:84a-1: h'a la h'a la lo ke shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3420:84a-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug h'a la h'a la'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3420:84a-4: h'a la h'a la la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3420:84a-5: sngon ma bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa bsgoms nas /
T02D3420:84a-6: hr'i:yig sa bon las skyes pa'i //
T02D3420:84a-7: h'a la h'a la brtse chen po //
T02D3420:84a-8: zhal gsum de bzhin spyan gsum pa //
T02D3420:84a-9: ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing //
T02D3420:84a-10: dang po'i zhal ni dkar po ste //
T02D3420:84a-11: g-yas pa sngon po g-yon pa dmar //
T02D3420:84a-12: dbu la zla ba phyed pas brgyan /
T02D3420:84a-13: thod pa rnams kyis zur phud byas //
T02D3420:84a-14: ral pa'i nang gnas rgyal ba dang //
T02D3420:84a-15: rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag brgyan //
T02D3420:84a-16: chu skyes dkar po'i mdog dang mtshungs //
T02D3420:84a-17: sgeg pa'i nyams kyis shin tu mdzes //
T02D3420:84a-18: phyag drug zhal ni sma ra can //
T02D3420:84a-19: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' dgyes //
T02D3420:84a-20: phyag g-yas dang po mchog sbyin dag //
T02D3420:84a-21: gnyis pa na ni bgrang phreng bsnams //
T02D3420:84a-22: gsum pa mda' dang gar gyi stabs //
T02D3420:84a-23: g-yon pa ni de bzhin gzhu //
T02D3420:84a-24: gnyis par padma dkar po dang //
T02D3420:84a-25: gsum pa de bzhin rgyu ma 'dzin //
T02D3420:84a-26: bral g-yon pa'i steng du lha mo sgeg mo ste /
T02D3420:84a-27: g-yon pa chu skyes bsnams pa phyag g-yas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa /
T02D3420:84a-28: gzhan na me tog gis mdzes par byas pa /
T02D3420:84a-29: ral pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D3420:84a-30: g-yas logs na sprul gyis dkris pa'i rtse gsum /
T02D3420:84a-31: g-yon logs na padma la gnas pa'i me tog dri
T02D3420:84a-32: zhim po sna tshogs pas yongs su gang ba'i thod
T02D3420:84b-0: pa'o // @84b padma dmar po dang zla ba la
T02D3420:84b-1: rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsgom
T02D3420:84b-2: pa'o // par bya'o // de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
